game.title: Call of Duty – Browser Zombie Survival Shooter
name: Call of Duty
call-of-duty
game.s_dis: Call of Duty is a browser-based zombie survival shooter where you face endless waves of enemies and try to survive as long as possible.
game.l_dis:
Play Call of Duty – Classic Browser Zombie Shooter

Call of Duty – Unblocked offers a fan-made browser experience inspired by the iconic Call of Duty Zombies mode. Survive waves of undead enemies, earn points, buy upgrades, and push your high score as far as you can.

What is this Call of Duty Browser Game?

This game is a simplified, browser-friendly shooter inspired by the official Call of Duty Zombies mode. While not an official release, it captures the core experience: defend, survive, upgrade, and repeat.

How to Play

  • Move & Shoot: Use basic keyboard and mouse controls to take down enemies.
  • Survive waves: Each round becomes harder with faster and stronger enemies.
  • Earn points: Defeat zombies to earn points for weapon upgrades.
  • Upgrade weapons: Purchase stronger guns to survive higher waves.
  • High scores: Play for the highest score and longest survival time.

Key Features

  • Endless Waves: Survive as long as you can in an increasingly difficult mode.
  • Weapon Upgrades: Spend earned points to unlock stronger equipment.
  • Straightforward Gameplay: Simple point-and-shoot mechanics.
  • Inspired by COD Zombies: A nostalgic fan-made tribute.
  • Runs in Browser: No downloads, quick to play.

Why Play This Version?

If you want a quick, nostalgic zombie survival challenge similar to Call of Duty Zombies, this browser version is perfect—fast, simple, and addictive.

Survive the Waves

Grab your weapon, aim true, and see how long you can last against endless waves of the undead.
